name: SUPER SUPER FUN WORLD
description:
From the guy behind URBAN DREAMBOG comes another weird first person exploration game. Scroll down for download!

CONTENT WARNING:

Not for children, but safe to stream on Twitch/Youtube!

FEATURES:

- A free full game with around 15 minutes of playtime

- 3D platformer/exploration

- All original music and graphics

- Hidden stuff

CONTROLS:

MOVE: WASD + MOUSE

JUMP: SPACE

USE/OPEN: E

ATTACK: LEFT MOUSE

NOTE FOR WINDOWS 11 USERS:

Install this first: https://www.microsoft.com/de-DE/download/details.aspx?id=26999

2022 Pauersoft

https://www.twitch.tv/pixelpauer
